messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Todd
messages.msgSnippet: ... ==  Gosh, thanks :) I m glad to help any way I can. Todd ... You re just jealous because the voices are talking to ME!
messages.messageBody:
At 06:21 PM 10/14/02 -0500, you wrote:

>Todd, I don't get a chance to post often, but I just wanted to let you
>know that
>I love your posts and your answers to everything. You say what I want to say
>without me having to say it. You sure do save me a lot of time. :-)
>
>Namaste,
>Jen
==
<blushing> Gosh, thanks :) I'm glad to help any way I can.

Todd
------
You're just jealous because the voices are talking to ME! <g>
http://rambleman.tripod.com/index.html

messages.subject: Re: Todd
messages.msgSnippet: Todd, I don t get a chance to post often, but I just wanted to let you know that I love your posts and your answers to everything.  You say what I want to say
messages.messageBody:
Todd, I don't get a chance to post often, but I just wanted to let you know that
I love your posts and your answers to everything. You say what I want to say
without me having to say it. You sure do save me a lot of time. :-)

Namaste,
Jen
www.heartlightdfw.com


----- Original Message -----
From: Todd M.
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, October 14, 2002 6:13 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Eve the Goddess


At 05:40 AM 10/14/02 +0000, you wrote:

>We were created good--physically, emotionally, and spiritually. We
>had the full range of emotions, but we used them for good, not for
>bad. I picture a level, perfectly balanced.
>
>Then, Eve sinned. God had told her not to, because when she did it,
>she would surely die.
==
So why don't Christians worship Eve, since she was allegedly the first to
sacrifice herself?
Where did all those that died before Christ go?

Todd
------
You're just jealous because the voices are talking to ME! <g>
http://rambleman.tripod.com/index.html
